title: Deactive account
body:
Hello, I'm thinking about deactivating/lock my account and want to know how to do it.
And what are the steps to reactive my account in the futur.

This game is time sucking {{champion:8}}  and ain't got time now that exams are at my doorstep.

replies.body:
Good Luck on your exams, and major props for making a real life choice to put League on the backburner to focus on your studies!

You can disable your account by writing into our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once your account is disabled, you can turn it back on at any time by simply shooting us another ticket. ^_^
